ViewObject.Name: TotalNumOfADRsReport
ViewObject.SQLQuery: (SELECT 'Total number ADRs ', COUNT(*) AS TotalNumOfADRs FROM crs_compounds p, crs_content c, crs_risk_relations r, crs_risk_relation_purposes_vw a WHERE p.compound_id = c.compound_id AND p.compound_type = 'COMPOUND' AND c.release_status_flag = 'C' AND c.crs_id = r.crs_id AND r.crs_risk_id = a.crs_risk_id AND a.risk_purpose_code = 'CD' ) UNION ALL (SELECT 'Total number ADRs with CMQ ', COUNT(*) FROM crs_compounds p, crs_content c, crs_risk_relations r, crs_risk_relation_purposes_vw a, crs_risk_definitions d WHERE p.compound_id = c.compound_id AND p.compound_type = 'COMPOUND' AND c.release_status_flag = 'C' AND c.crs_id = r.crs_id AND r.crs_risk_id = a.crs_risk_id AND a.risk_purpose_code = 'CD' AND r.crs_risk_id = d.crs_risk_id AND SUBSTR(d.meddra_level,1,3) = 'CMQ' )
